overview:
MirrorWeb is an end-2-end website backup and disaster recovery service.

MirrorWeb is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Total Escrow Solutions Plc (TES), which provides software escrow services, verification testing and IP solutions to organisations worldwide.

We are trusted by hundreds of companies to secure their business critical applications and maintain business continuity.

We are also an approved supplier to the UK Home Office and Cabinet Office, reinforcing the stringency of our systems and quality of our services. Our operations, processes and procedures are ISO9001:2008 certified and we are a Carbon Neutral company.

Our service delivers value to our customers by providing peace of mind. If your website fails for any reason, it will not be offline for more than a few minutes. Guaranteed.

Our proprietary technology provides reassurance that if one of your website suppliers has a problem, then you will not. Our robust solution gives you complete peace of mind that your website will be consistently available.
